title: Official George Floyd Memorial Fund
subtitle: This fund is established to cover funeral and burial expenses, mental and grief counseling, lodging and travel for all court proceedings, and to assist his family in the days to come as they continue to seek justice for George. A portion of these funds will also go to the Estate of George Floyd for the benefit and care of his children and their educational fund.

title: Center for Black Equity
subtitle: The Center for Black Equity is the National leader in connecting members of the Black LGBTQ+ community with information and resources to educate, engage and empower their fight for equity and access.

title: Justice for Tianna (Donate for Legal Costs)
subtitle: Tianna Arata is another Black woman who was wrongfully accused and detained by exercising her right to protest. Tianna is an educated, inspirational, young woman who has been fighting for the Black community through her blood, sweat, and tears for months! She has organized many peaceful protests in the San Luis Obispo community.
